About Garuda AI Tax Assistant

Your intelligent companion for effortless and optimized tax filing.

Our Mission

Garuda AI empowers every Indian taxpayer by simplifying tax filing using artificial intelligence. We aim to save your time, increase accuracy, and help you maximize your tax savings—all in one place.

What We Offer

  • AI-powered document scanning and data extraction (Form 16, investment proofs, etc.)
  • Real-time tax computation and filing recommendations
  • Personalized insights for maximum tax-saving opportunities
  • Secure data handling with end-to-end encryption
  • User-friendly dashboard for managing tax-related documents and history

Who It's For

Garuda AI is designed for salaried professionals, freelancers, small businesses, and consultants who want an intelligent, hassle-free approach to taxes. Whether you’re new to taxes or a seasoned professional, our assistant adapts to your needs.

Our Vision

To be India’s most reliable AI-based tax platform by delivering innovation, trust, and transparency in every step of the financial journey.

); }; export default About;
